name: Golf 'em all ! [GameJam]
description:
Use your golf club to play golf and more likes killing spiders or break walls !

Small game for VR made alone in 4 days during a gamejam. The theme was  : one tool, many uses  !

I miss some time to finish the game as I wanted but there is 6 levels fully playable.

Page of the jam : https://itch.io/jam/vr-jam-2020

Recommandations :

Should be compatible with all OpenVR HMD ( HTC Vive, Oculus)

You have to launch steam and turn on controller before launching the game (or the screen has a strange bug)

Enjoy it !
